CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Rail Networks relative to Parcel Services?
SRP.A: Rail Networks is {above} Parcel Services in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Parcel Services relative to Rail Networks?
SRP.A: Parcel Services is {below} Rail Networks in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Air Express relative to Parcel Services?
SRP.A: Air Express is {below} Parcel Services in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Air Express}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cargo shipments?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Rail Networks}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Parcel Services's minimum Cargo Shipments in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Parcel Services's minimum Cargo Shipments is in {1961}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Rail Networks's maximum Cargo Shipments in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Rail Networks's maximum Cargo Shipments is in {1978}.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1983, was the average total Cargo Shipments higher or lower than between 1973 and 1974?
NC.A: The average total cargo shipments between 1968 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1980, was the average total Cargo Shipments higher or lower than between 1966 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total cargo shipments between 1963 and 1980 was {lower} than between 1966 and 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1983, was the average total Cargo Shipments higher or lower than between 1967 and 1976?
NC.A: The average total cargo shipments between 1979 and 1983 was {higher} than between 1967 and 1976.

NC.Q: Was the total Cargo Shipments in 1966 higher or lower than in 1967?
NC.A: The total cargo shipments in 1966 was {lower} than in 1967.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Air Express} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Air Express and Rail Networks first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Air Express and Rail Networks first exchanged leading positions in {1962}.
